department: NADIMPALLI SATYANARAYANA RAJU INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY (NSRIT) AUTONOMOUS
description: A comprehensive technical and management fest, 'TECHNIMBLE 2025', organized by NSRIT. The event features a variety of activities including Poster Presentations, Paper Presentations, Project Expos, Technical Quizzes, Modeling & 3D Printing, Technical Treasure Hunts, Bridge Bust, B-Quiz, Ad-Mad, and Startup Idea competitions across multiple disciplines.
target_audience: Students from various engineering and management disciplines (CSE, CSD, CSM, ECE, EEE, MECH, CIVIL, MBA, MCA)
additional_info: Conveners: Dr.A.S.S.V. Ram Kumar, Dr.V. Sreerama Murthy. Coordinator: Sri. N. Viswanadha Reddy. The institute is accredited by NBA (National Board of Accreditation). Registration can be done by scanning the provided QR code.
